description: 【English version】Update 2020.10.10, add the overall resource overview! Support Grafana6&7,Support Node Exporter v0.16 and above.Optimize the main metrics display. Includes: CPU, memory, disk IO, network, temperature and other monitoring metrics。https://github.com/starsliao/Prometheus

targets.expr: sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"} - (node_memory_Cached_bytes{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"}))

sum by(instance)(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"} - (node_memory_Cached_bytes{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"}))

sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__interval])) + sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__interval]))

panels.description: CurrEstab: The number of TCP connections whose current status is ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT.
panels.title: Server Resource Overview

title: Platform Monitoring
